vector-skin-desc:
Bo vector inga ɛ 2:
*2011 - Monobuke pa'alɛ n tari nimpaala la yɛla zo'e zo'e n wan basɛ ti la kan tɔna ti nɛŋatɔlega bɔna. 
*2022 - Vɛketa la naam pa'asɛ la WMF [[mw:Desktop Improvements]] tuunɛ
prefs-vector-enable-vector-1-help: Yuunsi'a n kini na wa, tu wan tu wan tɛɛra Vector la ti di dɛna bumpaalega. Vector paalega la wam bɔ'ɔra fole ti fu bisera yelesi'a n boi Vector kɛka la puan (pɔsera Sapɔlɔgɔ 2019). Fu san bɔta ti tu zamesɛ teere la yele, kiŋɛ [[mw:Reading/Web/Desktop_Improvements|project page]].
vector-opt-out-tooltip: Tee fu  fu maalegɔ la lebe ankɛka la puan(vector paalega)
vector-language-button-aria-label:
Kiŋɛ atikilɛ n bo tɔgum ayima puan. Bɔna
{{PLURAL:$1|$1 language |$1 languages }}
vector-no-language-button-aria-label: Atikeli kuna bɔna la yeletɔgum kuna puan. Dikɛ atikeli la pa'ase yeletɔgum buna puan.
vector-language-redirect-to-top: Yeletɔgum la likɛ duma la bo la pɛgerɛ la saazuo yakɛ tile la.
vector-search-loader: Ba boti la pakirɛ bisega puti'irɛ
vector-anon-user-menu-pages: Pɛgera n bɔ'ɔra leregere duma la ti ŋmɛ yese ba
vector-toc-collapsible-button-label: Toggle la n de yelezuoto la
vector-limited-width-toggle: Toggle ŋmaa yelezuo la mɛ ti la karegɛ
vector-limited-width-toggle-on-popup: Fu lagɛ fu layout la ti la pirɛ kinkiliŋa la. Fu san boɔta ti fu lebɛ kinkiliŋa la, di bɔtimɛ la.
vector-limited-width-toggle-off-popup: Fu ta'am toggle ze'ele magere kinkiliŋa la ,la kinkiliŋa la za'a gee dĩ bɔtemɛ la.
vector-prefs-limited-width: Basɛ ti gu'a bɔna yalegerɛ la puan
vector-prefs-limited-width-help: Basɛ ti gu'a bɔna yalegerɛ la puan ti la suŋɛ kaalegɔ tole nɛŋa
empty-language-selector-body: Pɛgerɛ la yelezuto ka sugerɛ bɔna yeletɔgum sɛba puan
vector-toc-unpinned-popup: Yelezuto la, ba dikɛ ba kalam mɛ.
vector-page-tools-unpinned-popup: Lɔgerɔ zi'an la tee bɔna la kalam
vector-main-menu-unpinned-popup: Loosego zi'an la tee bɔna la kalam
vector-readability-survey-description: Wikipiidiya gulesegɔ ani suŋa la ŋwani bo fum? Digesɛ lɔgetuna wa tee nimbia la. Zamesɛ yɛla zo'e zo'e yɛsera [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Reading/Web/Accessibility for reading|Accessibility for reading project]].
vector-readability-survey-paragraphSpaci: Putɛzure folego n wan zuna se'em
vector-readability-survey-optout: Di'e tole nɛŋa ta dıkɛ fu maalegɔ bo to gee dıkɛ fu lebesego ta'asɛ pɛgese'ere n tagelɛ la.  [[#close-vector-survey|Remove this tool]].
